title: Platform Rules & Terms
subtitle: To maintain platform order and protect user rights, please carefully read the following rules and terms

terms.title: Terms of Use
items: BeatMM Pro is a music sharing and DJ community platform for Myanmar users, limited to legal and peaceful purposes only.
User-uploaded content must be original or authorized. Stealing others' music, covers, or descriptions is prohibited.
All tipping behaviors are voluntary by users, and tip refunds are not supported. The platform provides technical services and charges service fees.
User registration on the platform indicates agreement to comply with platform rules. For violations, the platform has the right to delete content or ban accounts.
Uploading or publishing any illegal, pornographic, violent, hateful, or political content is prohibited.
This platform prohibits user private messaging and only allows interaction with system customer service to ensure information security and compliance.
Real payment information must be provided before withdrawal. If the withdrawal account does not match the registered identity, the platform has the right to refuse processing.
BeatMM Pro reserves the right of final interpretation and may modify terms at any time to adapt to local regulations or operational strategies.

payment.title: Tipping & Withdrawal Rules
items: Users can recharge their accounts through KPay, KBZ Banking, etc., and use them to tip their favorite DJs.
Tip amounts are freely chosen by users. Once confirmed, tips cannot be revoked or refunded.
Tip income will enter the DJ's account, and the platform will automatically deduct a 10% technical service fee.
DJs can apply for withdrawal when their balance reaches 3,000 MMK. Withdrawal amounts will be distributed through KPay/KBZ Banking.
All withdrawal applications will be manually reviewed by administrators within 24 hours, requiring upload of real payment QR codes.
Withdrawal accounts must match the phone number bound to the DJ account. Using others' accounts or false information is strictly prohibited.
If fake tipping, forged screenshots, or fraudulent transactions are discovered, accounts will be immediately banned and balances frozen.

dj.title: DJ Certification Rules
items: Any BeatMM user can submit applications on the 'Apply to Become DJ' page, filling in personal information and uploading music works.
Applications must submit: stage name, avatar, at least one original music work.
The platform will conduct manual review within 1-2 business days, mainly reviewing: work originality, sound quality, and compliance.
After successful certification, DJs can obtain permissions: upload music, view data, withdraw income, enter ranking system.
If DJs upload content that violates regulations (infringing music, false information, violating comments), certification will be revoked and permanently banned.
Each DJ is fully responsible for their uploaded content, and the platform bears no copyright infringement liability.
Creation of Vietnamese drum, Myanmar style, and local original music works is encouraged.

warning.title: Important Notice
warning.content: Using this platform indicates that you have read, understood, and agreed to comply with all the above rules and terms. The platform is committed to providing users with a safe and compliant music sharing environment, working together to maintain a good community atmosphere. If you have questions, please contact customer service or check help documentation.
